key.name: move-window-to-new-workspace
key.description: Enable or disable moving windows to new workspaces.

key.name: add-username-to-quick-menu
key.description: Enable or disable adding the username to the quick menu.

key.name: lock-icon
key.description: Enable or disable the lock icon.

key.name: transparent-move
key.description: Enable or disable transparent move.

key.name: battery-percentage
key.description: Enable or disable showing battery percentage.

key.name: move-calendar-right
key.description: Move the calendar to the right side of the top panel and hide the notifications panel.

key.name: transparent-on-moving
key.description: If true, windows become transparent when they are being moved.

key.name: transparent-on-resizing
key.description: If true, windows become transparent when they are being resized.

key.name: window-opacity
key.description: Opacity value (0-255) for windows when moving or resizing.

key.name: transition-time
key.description: Time in seconds for the opacity transition animation.

key.name: show-window-title
key.description: Display the current window title in the top panel.

key.name: show-window-controls
key.description: Display window control buttons in the top panel when window is maximized.

key.name: button-type
key.description: Determines which set of icons to use for window control buttons.

key.name: button-size
key.description: Determines the size of window control buttons (small: 14px, normal: 16px).

key.name: panel-hover-fullscreen
key.summary: Show Panel on Hover in Fullscreen
key.description: Show the top panel when hovering near the top edge in fullscreen mode.

key.name: panel-transparency
key.description: Make the top panel transparent.

key.name: panel-transparency-level
key.description: Set the transparency level of the panel (0-100).

key.name: panel-opaque-on-window
key.description: Make panel opaque when a window touches it.

key.name: hide-minimized-windows
key.description: Hide minimized windows in the overview.

key.name: enable-app-window-buttons
key.description: Enable or disable window control buttons in application windows (affects GTK theming).

key.name: hide-activities-button
key.description: Hide the Activities button in the top panel.

key.name: overview-wallpaper-background
key.description: Use the current desktop wallpaper as a blurred background in the overview.

key.name: skip-overview-on-login
key.description: Do not show the overview when logging into GNOME. Still shows animation.

key.name: keyboard-indicator
key.description: Enable additional options for the panel keyboard/input source indicator.

key.name: hide-keyboard-indicator
key.description: Completely hide the keyboard/input source indicator from the panel.

key.name: enable-firefox-styling
key.description: Manage Firefox userChrome.css to apply Kiwi window controls styling and hide Firefox window buttons when panel controls are shown.

key.name: panel-color-inherit
key.description: Apply background-color: inherit to fix panel color issues on some themes (e.g., white panel on dark themes).

key.name: enable-launchpad-app
key.description: Adds a custom Launchpad icon to dock that opens the application overview.
